meanings.sent1: Over time, the metal patinates and changes color.
meanings.sent2: The antique statue patinates beautifully, adding character.
meanings.sent3: The old coin patinates like a magic spell, turning green.
meanings.sent4: The history of the building patinates the walls with stories.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a special technique to patinate the sculpture.

meanings.sent1: The patinates vase looked elegant on the shelf.

meanings.sent4: Her patinates jewelry collection was truly unique.
